author: CBS News
title: Coronavirus updates: COVID-19 death toll in U.S. passes 7,100
description: The CDC is recommending Americans wear cloth face coverings in public to help slow the spread of the virus.
content: Attorney General William Barr on Friday instructed the Bureau of Prisons to focus their assessment of eligibility for home confinement on the three prisons most affected by coronavirus: Louisiana's FCI Oakdale, Connecticut's FCI Danbury and Ohio's FCI Elkton.… [+1072 chars]
